com.atc.simulator.config

Class ApplicationConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atc.simulator.config.ApplicationConfig

extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class representing the configuration of this application.

      • getCoordinate

        public static GeographicCoordinate getCoordinate(java.lang.String path)
        Get the geographic coordinate from an array of doubles in the config file of the format [altitude, latitude, longitude], where the latitude and longitude are specified in degrees. For example: [0.0, 38.0, 148.0]
        Parameters:
        path - to element that contains the array
        Returns:
        GeographicCoordinate
